text: Petar Omčikus (; ); October 6, 1926 – April 26, 2019) was a Serbian painter. He was a member of the Serbian Academy of Sciences and Arts. He worked in Paris, France. He was born in Sušak, Kingdom of Yugoslavia. Omčikus died in Belgrade, Serbia on April 26, 2019 at the age of 92.Preminuo Petar Omčikus ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Serbian painters Category:Artists from Belgrade
title: Petar Omčikus
